required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 08, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effects of Ozone Therapy on Covid 19 Positive Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Ozone Therapy on Covid 19 Positive Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock:
Evaluation of the effects of ozone therapy given in addition to the treatment they received
      in covid 19 positive patients (hydroxychloroquine + azithromycin)

primary_outcome.measure: The effects of ozone therapy given in addition to the treatment they received in covid 19 positive patients (hydroxychloroquine + azithromycin)
primary_outcome.description: showing the effectiveness of daily low dose ozone therapy in covid 19 positive patients with pulmonary function tests and blood crp(mg/L), white blod cell (NLR) neutrophil-to-lymphocyte ratio, (LMR) lymphocyte-to-monocyte ratio

intervention.description: The effects of ozone therapy given in addition to the treatment they received in covid 19 positive patients (hydroxychloroquine + azithromycin)

study_pop.textblock:
showing the effectiveness of daily low dose ozone therapy in covid 19 positive patients
        with pulmonary function tests and blood crp white blod cell (lymphocyte / monocyte ratio)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  covid 19 positive

          -  no lung disease

          -  18- 45 years old women

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  covid 19 negative

          -  lung diease

          -  additional disease

          -  men

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
